oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Library Director, C. Lamar Wallis, with Friends of the Library president, and author
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Memphis Public Library & Information Center; Friends of the Library; Wallis, C. Lamar; Schaeffer, Martha; Sizemore, Chris; books; authors; 1970s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Note on back: "1977 -- The Friends of Memphis Public Library's second annual November Book and Author Dinner was another smash hit. Here, Library Director, C. Lamar Wallis and Friends President, Martha Schaeffer talk to Chris Sizemore (author of I'm Eve) after a luncheon attended by city officials, all news media and the four authors."
